meanings.definition: Enjoying or taking pleasure in something.
meanings.sent1: The children had a relishing time at the park.
meanings.sent2: She wore a relishing smile as she opened her birthday present.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's relishing antics never failed to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The relishing sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The relishing taste of the homemade pie lingered on his tongue.

meanings.sent1: He was relishing every bite of the delicious meal.

meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be relishing the attention from its adoring owner.
meanings.sent4: She was relishing the feeling of accomplishment after finishing her project.
meanings.sent5: The artist relished in the beauty of the colorful sunset painting.

meanings.definition: To delight in or find satisfaction in something.
meanings.sent1: They were relishing the success of their hard work.

meanings.sent3: The crowd was relishing the energetic performance on stage.
meanings.sent4: She relished the challenge of solving difficult puzzles.
